summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT SMOKE ENTERED THE CABIN OF THE VEHICLE WITHOUT WARNING. THE CONTACT TURNED OFF THE VEHICLE AND NOTICED SMOKE COMING FROM THE HOOD AND HEADLIGHTS. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO A DEALER TO BE DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS APPROXIMATELY 28,000.
